Package com.Ostermiller.Syntax.Lexer

This package contains classes for the lexers for Syntax Highlighting source files.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Lexer A lexer should implement this interface.

Package com.Ostermiller.Syntax.Lexer Description

This package contains classes for the lexers for Syntax Highlighting source files.
